text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ehh!? McQueen-san will leave the team!?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
It's just temporary. I have to attend to the Mejiro family 
because of some circumstances.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Sobbing!! If you leave, who will I enjoy teasing in the future!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: In the first place please leave me out of this!!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
text_block_list.text: But after all, we are gonna miss you.

text_block_list.name: Droopy-eyed Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Sob… Ace～…

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Black Bob-cut
text_block_list.text: McQueen-chan, hurry and come back!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I still want to run more. I'll be back soon.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
This team is a team where you can support each other and run 
towards your dreams.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Please treasure this bond.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: And, Rice-san.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huh, Yeah…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I hope you fulfill your dream to make everyone happy. Please aim 
to become such a Horse Girl.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Sob… Sobbing! McQueen-san!!
So for a while, McQueen left the team.
For the next few months, Rice Shower has been struggling.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
The first is Biwa Hayahide! Biwa Hayahide, finish at the goal! 
Rice Shower that prevented McQueen's feat is now in 5th place!

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: Rice Shower, keeps losing.

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text:
When she blocked Bourbon and McQueen's records, 
It felt like she was doing her best.

These voices were heard many times in the world. Where did Rice 
Shower at that time go?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Heh… Heh… Heh…! heh…

The movement of the last straight line was 
not bad, Rice, do you feel like running?

The movement of the last straight line was 
not bad, Rice, do you feel like running?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I have an image of catching up to top and 
I have confidence in my stamina. But…
Honestly. I can't find a reason to why Rice Shower can't win.

When She won the “Emperor Award” in the spring, Rice Shower's 
feeling's certainly became more positive.
Even though there are no more races, there are no results.
I wonder if the boos around her is affecting her.
choice_data_list: Would you like to stay away from racing for a while?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: No, I will run.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
No matter how many times I can't win, I've decided to run with my 
chest held high, even if everyone gets angry.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
And I promised McQueen that one day I would become a Horse Girl 
that everyone would be happy with.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san, I will run 1 more lap!
However, her losing streak still continues.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
The next appearance is Rice Shower, where defeat continues. Will 
it be revived in this race?

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: She will probably lose today anyway.

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: But… you know, She is still doing her best.

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, now that you mention it, even after losing this much, she 
hasn't given up yet.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Rice Shower is in 6th place!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Where did Rice Shower at that time, which defeated both Mihono 
Bourbon and Mejiro McQueen, go?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huh.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Oh, Trainer-san.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Hehe…. I couldn't win today either.

Even when Rice Shower desperately makes a smile, her eyes are wet 
with tears that seem to overflow.
choice_data_list: Don't be stubborn, you can cry.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: No, I won't cry. If you cry, it's better when you're happy.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Now, we have to work hard and train again! Let's go, Trainer-san!

When Rice Shower ran out, it was so light that you could not 
think it was after losing.
For her to shed tears of joy, what should I do?
